ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: The retired Grunt is working as an engineering consultant in Sierra Gordo when rebels seize him and other American citizens. Virtually the entire G.I. Joe team mobilizes to rescue their former teammate.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-08 14:57:24. [CVDB423697] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:41:11. [Issue ID 1139383]
